briefdescription.para: Check if the ESL LED is active.

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to the ESL Control Block

simplesect.para: true if the LED is active, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Check if the ESL Timed Queue contains a LED Control command.

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to the ESL Control Block

simplesect.para: true if a LED Control command is pending, false otherwise

briefdescription.para: Check if the ESL Timed Queue contains a Display Image command.

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to the ESL Control Block

simplesect.para: true if a Display Image command is pending, false otherwise

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to the ESL Control Block
- pointer to the ESL Control Block
- pointer to the ESL Control Block
- pointer to the ESL Control Block
- pointer to the ESL Control Block
- pointer to the timed operation queue
